articles.title: Why itâ€™s time to take AI-human relationships seriously
articles.summary: ChatGPTâ€™s launch in 2022 ushered in a new era of AI chatbots from companies like Meta, Nomi and Character AI that have proven to be quick-witted, argumentative, helpful and sometimes aggressively romantic. The speedy development of AI chatbots presents a mountain of ethical and safety concerns that experts say will only intensify once AI begins to train itself. CNBC's Sal Rodriguez has the story.
